org.openhubframework.openhub.core.alerts

Class EmailAlertListenerSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.alerts.EmailAlertListenerSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlertListener

    public class EmailAlertListenerSupport
extends Object
implements AlertListener
    Listener implementation that sends email notifications to admin mails.

    If alert is activated then email is sent - there are default subject and body but if there are defined subject or body for specified alert then these values are used. Also formats for subject and body can be changed.

    Since:
    0.4
    Author:
    Petr Juza

      • onAlert

        public final void onAlert(AlertInfo alert,
           long actualCount)
        Default implementation is to send email notification. If you need to implement whatever else then override onAlert(AlertInfo) with custom actions.
        Specified by:
        onAlert in interface AlertListener
        Parameters:
        alert - the activated alert
        actualCount - the actual count of items

        protected void onAlert(AlertInfo alert)

        Parameters:
        alert - the activated alert

      • formatSubject

        protected String formatSubject(AlertInfo alert)
        Formats custom subject from specified alert. Format uses the following values in the same order:
        • alert identification
        Override this method if you want to change subject formatting.
        Parameters:
        alert - the activated alert
        Returns:
        formatted subject

      • formatBody

        protected String formatBody(AlertInfo alert,
                long actualCount)
        Formats custom body from specified alert. Format uses the following values in the same order:
        • actual count
        • alert limit
        Override this method if you want to change body formatting.
        Parameters:
        alert - the activated alert
        actualCount - the actual count of items
        Returns:
        formatted body

      • sendEmail

        protected final void sendEmail(String subject,
             String body)
        Sends notification email to administrators.
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject
        body - the body
